alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marion, northern Forrest and northern Lamar Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mill Creek to near Ovett to near Sumrall to near Carson. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sumrall around 540 PM CDT. Macedonia around 550 PM CDT. Bunker Hill around 555 PM CDT. Hattiesburg, Oak Grove, Improve and Sunrise around 605 PM CDT. Columbia and Pine Ridge around 620 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
